title: SMP Kolkata Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Seacunny Posts
description: The Syama Prasad Mookerjee Port Kolkata (SMP Kolkata) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Seacunny Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, Intermediate (10+2) can grab this chance and apply for the SMP Kolkata Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the las...
